solution.text:
From part (iii),
Volume of cylinder, V \(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k**2*j),3)}}_\,m^3\)
Density, \(\rho=_{m}_\,\frac{kg}{cm^3}\)
Mass of the cylinder\(=\)Volume\(\times\)Density
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k**2*j),3)}}_ \times _{m}_\)
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k**2*j*m),2)}}_\,kg\)

content.text: Mass of the cylinder if its density is \(_{m}_\) kg per cu.m.
